We don't just move epic projects around the world, we also move ourselves. This February 2021, after a very successful 10 years in Vietnam, we set up a new home in District 2, Ho Chi Minh City. From 2 people in 2011, today we have a Chartering Department, our own Engineer, Port Captain and Stevedores - amongst 9 highly trained logistics professionals. This enables us to control full operations and with our own packing team we can support every client with highly efficient and seaworthy packing. Take a look at the photos and if you'd like to drop by for a visit, our new coffee machine is on!<\/p>","saveContent":"

wpPost.title: A new home set up for FLS Vietnam

seo.title: A new home set up for FLS Vietnam - FLS
seo.opengraphTitle: A new home set up for FLS Vietnam - FLS
seo.opengraphDescription: We don’t just move epic projects around the world, we also move ourselves. This February 2021, after a very successful 10 years in Vietnam, we set up a new home in District 2, Ho Chi Minh City. From 2 people in 2011, today we have a Chartering Department, our own Engineer, Port Captain and Stevedores… Continue reading FLS News Update Vietnam Office 6

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: We don't just move epic projects around the world, we also move ourselves. This February 2021, after a very successful 10 years in Vietnam, we set up a new home in District 2, Ho Chi Minh City. From 2 people in 2011, today we have a Chartering Department, our own Engineer, Port Captain and Stevedores - amongst 9 highly trained logistics professionals. This enables us to control full operations and with our own packing team we can support every client with highly efficient and seaworthy packing. Take a look at the photos and if you'd like to drop by for a visit, our new coffee machine is on!
